title: Forien's Quest Log
description: Modify default Forien's Quest Log colors and background

--palette-fql-qt-text-color.name: Quest Tracker text color
--palette-fql-qt-text-color.hint: Sets the Quest Tracker text color.

--palette-fql-qt-color-background.name: Quest Tracker app background color
--palette-fql-qt-color-background.hint: Sets the Quest Tracker app background color.

--palette-fql-qt-image-background.name: Quest Tracker background image
--palette-fql-qt-image-background.hint: Sets the Quest Tracker background app image.

--palette-fql-qt-color-background-entity.name: Quest Tracker entity link background color
--palette-fql-qt-color-background-entity.hint: Sets the Quest Tracker entity link background color.
